title: Report a Streetlight Outage
description: A resident calls to report that a streetlight on their street has been out for several days.

tasks.description: Get the location of the streetlight, including the nearest address and the pole number if visible.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately records the location details.

tasks.description: Query the asset management system to confirm the streetlight is a utility-owned asset.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the utility's responsibility for the specified pole.

tasks.description: Create a service order for the lighting department to repair the streetlight.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a work order for the repair.
